# Priority Actions - ID8Labs LLC

**Generated:** January 1, 2026

---

## Phase 1: Entity Formation (This Week)

### Action 1: File LLC on Sunbiz
**Agent:** FILER
**Cost:** $125
**Time:** 15 minutes online, 2-3 days processing
**URL:** https://dos.fl.gov/sunbiz/start-business/efile/

**Steps:**
1. Go to sunbiz.org â†’ "Start a Business" â†’ "E-File LLC"
2. Choose: Domestic Limited Liability Company
3. Enter: ID8Labs LLC (or ID8 Labs LLC)
4. Registered Agent: Self (Eduardo Belaval, FL address)
5. Management: Member-managed
6. Member: Eduardo Belaval (100%)
7. Pay $125
8. Save confirmation PDF

**Blocker:** None - can do today

---

### Action 2: Apply for EIN
**Agent:** FILER
**Cost:** FREE
**Time:** 5 minutes, instant approval
**URL:** https://www.irs.gov/businesses/small-businesses-self-employed/apply-for-an-employer-identification-number-ein-online

**Steps:**
1. Complete AFTER LLC approved
2. Go to IRS EIN Assistant
3. Select: LLC â†’ Single member
4. Enter Eddie's SSN as responsible party
5. Receive EIN immediately
6. Save/print confirmation (PDF doesn't last forever)

**Blocker:** Must complete Action 1 first

---

### Action 3: Open Business Bank Account
**Agent:** COMPTROLLER
**Cost:** $0 (most business accounts free)
**Time:** 30 minutes online or in-branch

**Recommended Banks:**
| Bank | Best For | Open Online? |
|------|----------|--------------|
| Mercury | Tech startups, integrations | Yes |
| Chase | Branch access, lending path | In-branch |
| Relay | Multiple accounts, auto-sorting | Yes |

**What to Bring/Have Ready:**
- Articles of Organization (from Sunbiz)
- EIN confirmation letter
- Personal ID
- Operating Agreement (if completed)

**Blocker:** Must complete Actions 1 & 2 first

---

## Phase 2: Legal Foundation (Within 30 Days)

### Action 4: Create Operating Agreement
**Agent:** ADVISOR
**Cost:** $0 (template) to $500 (attorney review)
**Time:** 1-2 hours

**Why Critical:**
- Required for liability protection
- Banks may ask for it
- Establishes ownership and management
- Protects against veil-piercing

**Options:**
| Approach | Cost | Quality |
|----------|------|---------|
| Free template (LegalZoom, etc.) | $0 | Basic, often sufficient |
| Paid template (LegalNature, etc.) | $50-100 | Better customization |
| Attorney draft | $300-500 | Best, but overkill for SMLLC |

**Recommendation:** Use a quality free template, have it ready before opening bank account.

---

### Action 5: Set Up Expense Tracking
**Agent:** LEDGER
**Cost:** $0-20/month
**Time:** 1-2 hours initial setup

**Recommended Approach (Aggressive Tax Stance):**
| Tool | Cost | Why |
|------|------|-----|
| **Wave** | Free | Simple, free, sufficient for solo |
| Relay Bank | Free | Auto-sorts into expense categories |
| Mercury | Free | Good integrations, receipt capture |

**Setup Steps:**
1. Connect business bank account
2. Create expense categories matching IRS Schedule C
3. Set up receipt capture (photo â†’ email to accounting)
4. Link any existing business credit cards

**Categories to Create:**
- Software & SaaS
- Cloud & Hosting
- Professional Services
- Education & Training
- Home Office
- Equipment
- Communication
- Meals (client meetings)

---

### Action 6: Document Home Office
**Agent:** LEDGER
**Cost:** $0
**Time:** 30 minutes

**What to Document:**
- [ ] Measure dedicated work area (square feet)
- [ ] Photograph the space (timestamped)
- [ ] Note total home square footage
- [ ] Save copy of lease or mortgage statement

**Deduction Calculation (Simplified Method):**
```
$5/sq ft Ã— [your square feet] = Annual deduction
Maximum: 300 sq ft = $1,500/year
```

**Example:** 100 sq ft dedicated area = $500/year deduction

## Phase 3: Tax Optimization Setup (Within 90 Days)

### Action 7: Audit Existing Tool Expenses
**Agent:** LEDGER
**Time:** 1-2 hours

**Goal:** Capture pre-formation expenses as startup costs.

**Review Last 12 Months For:**
- [ ] Claude Pro subscription
- [ ] Cursor subscription
- [ ] GitHub subscriptions
- [ ] Vercel charges
- [ ] Supabase charges
- [ ] Domain purchases
- [ ] Figma subscription
- [ ] Notion subscription
- [ ] Any other dev/business tools

**Tax Treatment:**
- Pre-formation expenses = "startup costs"
- Up to $5,000 immediately deductible in first year
- Remainder amortized over 15 years
- Must be expenses that WOULD have been deductible if LLC existed

---

### Action 8: Establish Tax Reserve System
**Agent:** COMPTROLLER
**Time:** 15 minutes (once bank open)

**Setup:**
1. Create sub-account or separate savings account
2. Name: "ID8Labs Tax Reserve"
3. Auto-transfer 30% of all revenue to this account

**Why 30%:**
- 22-24% income tax (marginal rate)
- 15.3% self-employment tax Ã— 92.35% = ~14%
- Less ~50% SE tax deduction
- Net: ~30% is safe reserve for taxes

**When Revenue Starts:**
- Every payment received â†’ 30% to tax reserve
- Estimated tax payments come from this account
- Never touch for operating expenses

---

### Action 9: Build Receipt Capture System
**Agent:** LEDGER
**Time:** 1 hour

**Options by Effort Level:**

| Method | Effort | Reliability |
|--------|--------|-------------|
| Email forwarding | Low | Medium |
| Dedicated app (Expensify, etc.) | Medium | High |
| Bank's built-in capture | Low | Medium |
| Manual folder system | High | Low |

**Recommended (Aggressive + Delegate Everything):**
1. Set up dedicated email: receipts@id8labs.com
2. Forward all purchase confirmations there
3. Connect to accounting software
4. Backup to cloud folder monthly

**Minimum Standard for Audit Defense:**
- All expenses $75+ have receipt
- All meals have: receipt + who + business purpose
- All travel has: receipt + business purpose
- Digital OK (photos, PDFs)
